title: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, indicating them as user input targets. In addition, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have differently colored backgrounds, making them stand out even more.
EB: The text fields in the Project Properties Info page should be created as readonly text fields instead of labels. This way, their values can still be selected and copied by the user.
SR:
1. Open the Project Properties dialog on a motif platform.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe the text fields with automatic borders and different colored backgrounds.
